A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot is awful\, 90% of the characters are unlikable and bland\, the Movie takes place immediately after the last film yet the resistance is in way worse shape how\, they don't explain anything like how the First Order even originated it makes no sense\, and I can only assume Disney ran a algorithm and determined this plot would get the most money. \n\nDespite all this I enjoyed Reys character who I feel embodies the spirit of star wars\, and it a great character however the rest is awful derivative cash grab
